title: The Besties Podcast XII
description:
The Besties return with their most unusual rule change yet: They've completely forgone making any sort of decision an instead created an robot version of their editor-in-chief Chris Grant to choose a winner for them.

... Yeah, it's one of those kinds of episodes.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
